data.title: Gould's New Essay Collection Available to Purchase
data.meta_description: MCAD adjunct faculty Sam Gould has released a collection of essays, available to purchase now. America Composes Itself is the title of the book containing their writings throughout the 2010s decade. A recipient of a 2014 McKnight Foundation Visual Arts Fellowship and a 2017 McKnight Foundation Mid-Career grant, Gould's writings examine topics and histories challenging our political, psychological, and physical terrains. Learn more
data.text:
MCAD adjunct faculty Sam Gould has released a collection of essays, available to purchase now.

America Composes Itself is the title of the book containing their writings throughout the 2010s decade. A recipient of a 2014 McKnight Foundation Visual Arts Fellowship and a 2017 McKnight Foundation Mid-Career grant, Gould's writings examine topics and histories challenging our political, psychological, and physical terrains.

Learn more
